response.overview: Berlin in February: cold and gray. For Foteini and Elena, who hail from sunny Greece and Italy, it's their first winter in Germany. New to the city of millions, they're searching for what life has to offer. Overwhelmed by the multitude of opportunities, they try to find their feet in Berlin while reconciling their longing for their distant homeland with their dreams. But the question remains: Are their dreams really the same?
response.title: Umzug Nummber 8
